channel.title: matplotlib on Jeremy Stewart
channel.description: Recent content in matplotlib on Jeremy Stewart

item.title: Climate Analysis and Exploration
item.description: If you were planning a trip to Hawaii, wouldn’t you want to make sure the weather was right for the time you’d be there? Be your own weatherman in this analysis of the state’s historical climate database. Precipitation Analysis Selecting only the data and prcp values, I designed a query to retrieve precipitation data from August 23, 2016 to July 10, 2017 and then plotted the results. Station Analysis Designed a query to calculate the total number of stations and to determine which ones were the most active.
